original: smug nag khros ma rag gdong ma'i dus gnad nges pa bzhugs so rgya gar skad du &&& bod skad du smug nag khros ma zhes bya ba mngon rdzogs yab la phyag 'tshal lo sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung don du smug nag khros ma rag gdong ma'i nag mo
analyzed: smug nag khro ma rag gdong ma dus gnad nges ba bzhugs so rgya gar skad du bod skad du smug nag khro ma zhes byed ba mngon rdzogs yab la phyag tshal lo sangs rgya ston ba bsrung don du smug nag khro ma rag gdong ma nag mo

original: khros ma gsang ba'i rgyud le'u brgya dang rtsa brgyad las shan pa gsod par byed pa yi las mtha' bsam gyis mi khyab kyang 'dir ni gsang chen dril ba yi nges par gnad du bsdus pa la srog la nges par bab pa yi ma mo nges par rgyu
analyzed: khro ma gsang ba brgyud leu brgya dang rtsa brgyad las shan ba gsod ba byed ba yi las mtha bsam gyis mi khyab kyang dir ni gsang chen dril ba yi nges ba gnad du sdud ba la srog la nges ba bab ba yi ma mo nges ba rgyu

original: ba yi dus la brten nas las kyi mtha' rnam pa gnyis su gsungs pa la ma mo nyid kyi rang gshed dang dgra rnams srog la za ba yi sbyor ba nges par bstan pa la 'dir ni gnyis kyi nges pa'i gnad 'khrul pa med pa'i rnal 'byor las
analyzed: ba yi dus la rten nas las kyi mtha rnam ba gnyis su gsungs ba la ma mo nyid kyi rang gshed dang dgra rnams srog la za ba yi sbyor ba nges ba ston ba la dir ni gnyis kyi nges ba gnad khrul ba med ba rnal byor las

original: nges par 'grub pa'i sngags kyi gnad las kyi thus ka bstan pa ni nges par lo gcig zla ba yang bcu gnyis rim par ma nor bas nges par gtan la phab byas te dgun dbyar ston dpyid zla ba la gsum gsum kho na nges rtsis pas dgun zla
analyzed: nges ba grub ba sngags kyi gnad las kyi thus ka ston ba ni nges ba lo gcig zla ba yang chu gnyis rim ba ma nor ba nges ba gtan la bebs byed te dgun dbyar ston dpyid zla ba la gsum gsum kho na nges rtsis ba dgun zla

original: dang po'i nya dang stong 'bring po brgyad dang nyi shu gnyis tha ma bcu gcig nyi shu lnga dpyid kyi dang po bzhi dang dgu 'bring po bcu dang nyi shu dgu tha ma tshes gsum nyi shu brgyad dbyar gyi dang po bcu bdun la nyi shu dag kyang
analyzed: dang po nya dang stong bring po brgyad dang nyi shu gnyis tha ma chu gcig nyi shu lnga dpyid kyi dang po bzhi dang dgu bring po chu dang nyi shu dgu tha ma tshes gsum nyi shu brgyad dbyar gyi dang po chu bdun la nyi shu dag kyang

original: de bzhin bdun 'bring po bcu dang nyi shu gcig tha ma bcu drug nyer bdun yin ston gyi dang po tshes drug dang nyi shu gsum la nges par rol 'bring po bcu dgu nyi shu gcig tha ma gnyis dang nyi shu brgyad /
analyzed: de bzhin bdun bring po chu dang nyi shu gcig tha ma chu drug nyer bdun yin ston gyi dang po tshes drug dang nyi shu gsum la nges ba rol bring po chu dgu nyi shu gcig tha ma gnyis dang nyi shu brgyad

original: de ltar zla ba bcu gnyis la rgyu ba'i zhag ni nyi shu bzhi lhag ma dag las rdugs par 'gyur de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi la nges par byas nas grub par nges de la nges pa'i gnad phye na nyin mo rgyu ba gsum las med lhag ma
analyzed: de ltar zla ba chu gnyis la rgyu ba zhag ni nyi shu bzhi lhag ma dag las rdugs ba gyur de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi la nges ba byed nas grub ba nges de la nges ba gnad byed na nyin mo rgyu ba gsum las med lhag ma

original: mtshan mo rgyu ba yin dgun 'bring dang po srod dang mjing gnyis pa nyi shu rde'u nag gsum pa phyed gong phyed tshad do dpyid zla dang po phyed yol dang de yi cha las rlung ni yang sum cu rtsa gnyis dag la'o 'bring po de nas drug cu
analyzed: mtshan mo rgyu ba yin dgun bring dang po srod dang mjing gnyis ba nyi shu rdeu nag gsum ba phyed gong phyed tshad do dpyid zla dang po phyed yol dang de yi cha las rlung ni yang sum cu rtsa gnyis dag la bring po de nas drug cu

original: bzhi tha chung de nas rlung nyer gnyis so dbyar ni dang po rlung bcu yin phyed dang bdun dang nyi shu ste 'bring po la ni /
analyzed: bzhi tha chung de nas rlung nyer gnyis so dbyar ni dang po rlung chu yin phyed dang bdun dang nyi shu ste bring po la ni

original: tha chung de bzhin drug gi cha ston gyi dang po rlung bzhi cha 'bring po nam ma'i mtha' la'o de yi 'og ma nyi shar dus tha chung de nas nyin phyed dang de nas mtshan mo bar dag yin de ni dus nges pa'i phyogs brtag pa'o smug nag
analyzed: tha chung de bzhin drug gi cha ston gyi dang po rlung bzhi cha bring po nam ma mtha la de yi g ma nyi char dus tha chung de nas nyin phyed dang de nas mtshan mo ba dag yin de ni dus nges ba phyogs rtog ba smug nag

original: 'jigs pa'i ma mo nyid nges par rgyu ba'i dus ni 'di dag go zla ba dang po bzhi la bsad pa'i dus bzhi yod do dgun gyi dang pho nya la shar nas nub tu nges par 'gyu bas dgra bo'i ling ga rgya shog la bris la dur khrod
analyzed: jigs ba ma mo nyid nges ba rgyu ba dus ni di dag go zla ba dang po bzhi la bsad ba dus bzhi yod do dgun gyi dang pho nya la char nas nub tu nges ba gyu ba dgra bo ling ga rgya shog la bri la dur khrod

original: kyi shing bu la bskyon la kha shar du bstan la de'i mdun du bong ba'i rdzas kyis bdug pa'i tshul du btang la rang gshin rje gshed kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la ling ga'i rgyab nas nyung nag dang btsan dug la sngags 'dis brab bo ma m+aa
analyzed: kyi shing bu la skyon la kha char du ston la de mdun du bong ba rdzas kyis bdug ba tshul du gtong la rang gshin rje gshed kyi ting nge dzin la jug la ling ga rgyab nas nyung nag dang btsan dug la sngags dis brab bo ma m+aa

original: srog sdug sdug lam sod rag mo snying sa m+aa ya b+h+yo b+h+yoh zhes brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges par 'grub bo dpyid kyi dang po'i tshes dgu la nub nas shar du 'gyu ste yang ling ga yang nub nas shar du kha bstan la bdag nyid kyi gdong la
analyzed: srog sdug sdug lam sod rag mo snying sa m+aa ya b+h+yo b+h+yoh zhes brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges ba grub bo dpyid kyi dang po tshes dgu la nub nas char du gyu ste yang ling ga yang nub nas char du kha ston la bdag nyid kyi gdong la

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba byugs la skra spyi bo'i gtsug tu bcings la khrag sna tshogs la sngags 'dis brab bo tsa ts+aa sha sh+aa khrag snying 'dir shag lu'u tsa ts+aa ya ma h+aa /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba byug la skra spyi bo gtsug tu ching la khrag sna tshogs la sngags dis brab bo tsa ts+aa sha sh+aa khrag snying dir shag luu tsa ts+aa ya ma h+aa

original: snying dar snying thum shig ya ma e ka dza ti srog thun rbad ces stong phrag gcig bzlas pas 'grub bo dbyar gyi dang po nyer bzhi la lho nas byang du nges par 'gyu bas yang ling ga la sogs pa gong ltar bcas la bdag nyid gcer bur
analyzed: snying dar snying thum shig ya ma e ka dza ti srog thun rbod ces stong phrag gcig bzlas ba grub bo dbyar gyi dang po nyer bzhi la lho nas byang du nges ba gyu ba yang ling ga la sogs ba gong ltar cha la bdag nyid bcer bur

original: phyung la thal chen la sngags 'di bzlas la brab bo raka mo raka mo snying sha ku ru dza dzah snying shag khos zhes brgyas nges par 'grub bo ston zla dang po'i nyi shu gsum la byang nas lhor 'gyu ste yang ling+ga yang kha byang du bstan la
analyzed: byin la thal chen la sngags di bzlas la brab bo raka mo raka mo snying sha ku ru dza dzah snying shag khos zhes brgyas nges ba grub bo ston zla dang po nyi shu gsum la byang nas lhor gyu ste yang ling+ga yang kha byang du ston la

original: bdag nyid shog gu'i 'bag gyon la bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga la sngags 'di stong bzlas bsreg go ma m+aa e ka dza ti snying thum dzah zhes brjod pas nges par 'grub bo de dag ni khyad par du ma mo srog la 'jug pa'i dus nges pa'o
analyzed: bdag nyid shog gu bag gyon la byed mo nag mo sgo nga la sngags di stong bzlas bsreg go ma m+aa e ka dza ti snying thum dzah zhes rjod ba nges ba grub bo de dag ni khyad ba du ma mo srog la jug ba dus nges ba

original: 'di'i dus na ma nor bar las la sbyar na dgra gang yin pa'i krog nges par chad do de ma yin lhag ma'i dus nyi shu'i dus rnams su yang dpal nag mo khros ma la gtor ma dbul zhing las bcol lo ma mo'i las bzlog cing rang gshed
analyzed: di dus na ma nor ba las la sbyor na dgra gang yin ba krog nges ba chad do de ma yin lhag ma dus nyi shu dus rnams su yang dpal nag mo khro ma la thor ma bul zhing las chol lo ma mo las bzlog cing rang gshed

original: la 'bebs par 'dod na dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa zhig bris la sngags gong ma bzhi po phyogs ma log par bris la lte ba la dgra gang yin pa'i ming rus ra khrag gis bris la ma mo'i bsad pa'i thun sngags rnams bzlog
analyzed: la bebs ba dod na dur khrod kyi ras la khor lo rtsibs bzhi ba jig bri la sngags gong ma bzhi po phyogs ma log ba bri la lte ba la dgra gang yin ba ming rus ra khrag gis bri la ma mo bsad ba thun sngags rnams bzlog

original: la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas la zangs phye dang lcags phye la sngags 'di bzlas shing brabs la de nas dgra bo'i gzugs bag zan dang rkang rjes kyi sa la sogs pa la snying khar 'khor lo de dril la bcug la de la tsher ma sna
analyzed: la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas la zangs byed dang lcags byed la sngags di bzlas shing brab la de nas dgra bo gzugs bag zan dang rkang rjes kyi sa la sogs ba la snying khar khor lo de dril la jug la de la tsher ma sna

original: tshogs btsugs la ma mo gang nas 'gyu ba'i ngos su kha bstan la dpal e ka dza t+ai'i tsakli sku mdog smug nag skra grol ba zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa spyi bo'i gtsug na ral pa kham nig gyen la 'khyil ba dbu la thod pa'i phreng bas
analyzed: tshogs btsugs la ma mo gang nas gyu ba ngos su kha ston la dpal e ka dza t+ai tsakli sku mdog smug nag skra grol ba zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs ba spyi bo gtsug na ral ba kham nig gyen la khyil ba dbu la thod ba phreng ba

original: brgyan pa dpral ba'i dkyil na spyan gcig khrag mig tu khol ba mchee ba gcig gsod pa'i phyir rab tu brdar ba g.yas na tsit+ta dmar po bsnams nas zhal du gsol ba g.yon pa zhing chung gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa zhig bris la gang nas 'gyu ba'i ngos
analyzed: rgyan ba dpral ba dkyil na spyan gcig khrag mig tu khol ba mchee ba gcig gsod ba phyir rab tu rdar ba g.yas na tsit+ta dmar po snom nas zhal du gsol ba g.yon ba zhing chung gi rgyal mtshan snom ba jig bri la gang nas gyu ba ngos

original: su ling ga bstan la de'i bar du gu gul sbyar ma dang khyi lud dang yugs sa mo'i dor rta dang skra la sogs pa mi gtsang ba'i rdzas kyis bdug go bdag nyid ma mo'i rgyab kyi ngos nas mkhar ba'i phye ma sngags 'dis brab bo ro ru
analyzed: su ling ga ston la de ba du gu gul sbyor ma dang khyi lud dang yugs sa mo dor rta dang skra la sogs ba mi gtsang ba rdzas kyis bdug go bdag nyid ma mo rgyab kyi ngos nas mkhar ba byed ma sngags dis brab bo ro ru

original: e ka dza ti snying kha rag ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
analyzed: e ka dza ti snying kha rag ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum

original: zhes pa rtag tu bzlas shing gtor ma btang bka' bsgo zhing gzir na ma mo nyid rab tu khros nas dgra bo gang yin pa de'i srod gcod nges so 'di ni gong ma'i las ma 'grub na bya ba yin gyis gang ltar snang snang du bya ba ni
analyzed: zhes ba rtag tu bzlas shing thor ma gtong bka sgo zhing gzir na ma mo nyid rab tu khro nas dgra bo gang yin ba de srod gcod nges so di ni gong ma las ma grub na byed ba yin gyis gang ltar snang snang du byed ba ni

original: ma yin no de ltar byas la ma mo dbugs 'byin pa'i cho ga bya'o a mri ta dang gtor mas mchod cing bskang ngo de nas yang dgra la bskul zhing 'bod rbad kyi las bya'o gong ma 'bod pa'o rbad pa ni +amo ma ma trag rag sha snying
analyzed: ma yin no de ltar byed la ma mo dbugs byin ba cho ga byed a mri ta dang thor mas mchod cing skong ngo de nas yang dgra la skul zhing bod rbod kyi las byed gong ma bod ba rbod ba ni +amo ma ma trag rag sha snying

original: thums rbad myogs thum thum rbad myogs thum thum rbad snying gzer sgrog 'dar yid chum srog prig prig sham khyer b+h+yo zhes 'gyu ba'i dus rnams su rbad do bsad pa ni gong ma'i sngags tshan bzhi po yin no //
analyzed: thums rbod myogs thum thum rbod myogs thum thum rbod snying gzer sgrog dar yid chum srog prig prig sham khyer b+h+yo zhes gyu ba dus rnams su rbod do bsad ba ni gong ma sngags tshan bzhi po yin no

original: snying sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma 'dis dbul lo 'bod pa'i sngags mjug la ma mo rag mo e ka dza ti i dam ba ling+ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi zhes pa lan bdun du dbul lo ma mo nges pa'i dus bzhi la lcags phye dang nyung kar
analyzed: snying sna tshogs ba thor ma dis bul lo bod ba sngags mjug la ma mo rag mo e ka dza ti i dam ba ling+ta kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi zhes ba lan bdun du bul lo ma mo nges ba dus bzhi la lcags byed dang nyung kar

original: nyung nag dang dug sna tshogs la rbad pa'i sngags bzlas la skyes pa'i grir shi ba'am rabs chad kyi snying gi nang du bcug la de'i phyi nas nag mo'i zan dron gyi gril la sgul thog gi nang du bcug cing dgra'i phyogs su 'phang ngo de ltar dus
analyzed: nyung nag dang dug sna tshogs la rbod ba sngags bzlas la skye ba grir chi ba rabs chad kyi snying gi nang du jug la de phyi nas nag mo zan dron gyi gril la sgul thogs gi nang du jug cing dgra phyogs su phen ngo de ltar dus

original: la 'khrul pa med cing sbyor ba ma log par byas na 'grub pa la the tshom med do zla ba bzhi po'i las sbyor rdzogs tsa na dgra bo 'gum pa la the tshom med do gal te pha rol po ma mo 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba shes pa
analyzed: la khrul ba med cing sbyor ba ma log ba byed na grub ba la the tshom med do zla ba bzhi po las sbyor rdzogs tsa na dgra bo gum ba la the tshom med do gal te pha rol po ma mo di nyid kyi sbyor ba shes ba

original: yin na 'og ma las ldog par byas na de ltar lan bdun byas na kho rang gi srog khrag tu skyugs nas srog chad pa la the tshom byar med do de dag gi dus na ma mo las la bskul zhing rbad pa 'di skad do h+aum bskal pa
analyzed: yin na g ma las ldog ba byed na de ltar lan bdun byed na kho rang gi srog khrag tu skyug nas srog chad ba la the tshom byar med do de dag gi dus na ma mo las la skul zhing rbod ba di skad do h+aum bskal ba

original: me ltar 'bar ba'i dur khrod nas shin tu gsod pa'i smug nag khro mo ni nam mkha'i gzugs can lho sprin go zug can tsit+ta za zhing dam nyams snying khrag 'dren zhing chung dbyug pas dgra snying tshal par 'gems 'jigs byed chen por ral pa'i thor tshugs can
analyzed: me ltar bar ba dur khrod nas shin tu gsod ba smug nag khro mo ni nam mkha gzugs can lho sprin go zug can tsit+ta za zhing dam nyams snying khrag bgrang zhing chung dbyug ba dgra snying tshal ba gem jigs byed chen por ral ba thor tshugs can

original: dpral na mig gcig srid gsum khungs nas 'byin zhal nas tshems gcig dgra bo'i srog gcod ma tsit+ta 'di gsol dam tshig srog la rngams sha khrag longs spyod dmar gtor 'di bzhes la dam tshig dbang gis dam nyams gshed ma mdzod ma mo khrag la dgyes phyir 'di
analyzed: dpral na mig gcig srid gsum khungs nas byin zhal nas tshems gcig dgra bo srog gcod ma tsit+ta di gsol dam tshig srog la rngams sha khrag longs spyod dmar thor di bzhes la dam tshig dbang gis dam nyams gshed ma mdzod ma mo khrag la dgyes phyir di

original: gsol la bdag gi las kun thogs med grub mdzod cig sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'di gsol la dam tshig dus la bab bo sa ma y+aa zhes rbad do ma mo snying thig gsang ba'i las gang dang yang mi 'dra ba rin po che'i yi ge bzhi
analyzed: gsol la bdag gi las kun thogs med grub mdzod cig sha khrag dmar gyi thor ma di gsol la dam tshig dus la bab bo sa ma y+aa zhes rbod do ma mo snying thig gsang ba las gang dang yang mi dra ba rin po che yi ge bzhi

original: la sogs pa'i bka' srung smug nag khros ma rag gdong ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so rgya rgya rgya
analyzed: la sogs ba bka srung smug nag khro ma rag gdong ma zhes byed ba rdzogs so rgya rgya rgya
